file_content.text: You're in bad shape, Lieutenant. A few grave robbers too much for you?
They're a special crew. Took some sort of secret passage into the tomb, around our defenses.
The Sith want them cleared out, but... too many places for them to hide in there. Underworld scum.
Best start using your eyes. If they've stolen anything valuable, it'll be your head.
Just shut up and fix me. Bottom-feeders will be sorry they ever stepped on Korriban.
